title: Interpretation of a dream about convulsions in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing convulsions in a dream in detail is presented to you in this article. You may also be interested in knowing how to adopt a child in a dream. Body convulsions in a dream are an unusual vision that many people do not dream of. The meanings and interpretations of this dream vary from one person to another and according to the events and details of the dream narrated by the fortuneteller. Throughout the article, all the interpretations of the most famous interpretation scholars will be presented. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing convulsions in a dream in detail. Convulsions are involuntary contractions that occur in the muscles of the body. Cramps can occur in one muscle, in the leg muscles, or in more than one muscle at the same time. Spasms cause potential pain or severe pain at times. Spasms can occur during sleep or wakefulness and many people suffer from them. In this paragraph we will talk about them. Interpretation of seeing spasms in a dream in detail: Interpretation scholars have spoken about this matter and said that whoever sees himself in a dream He suffers from convulsions in part of his body or the rest of his body and feels severe pain because of them, but despite the convulsions he moves his body. A body or part of the body is affected by convulsions, and this indicates determination and defiance within it and facing problems. It also indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s circumstances because he has a strong will. Seeing convulsions in a dream could mean that the dreamer has made a wrong decision and that his convulsions serve as a warning not to commit this mistake, and if he sees convulsions in a dream That his friend is convulsing, this indicates an illness. Seeing oneself in a dream suffering from painful convulsions and unable to move his body indicates loss and failure and may indicate challenges and problems that the dreamer is suffering from in his family or professional life. See also: Entering the police academy in The interpretation of seeing convulsions in a dream in detail for single women - which is the interpretation of seeing convulsions in a dream in detail. The single girl has many evidence: It may indicate the incompleteness of her emotional relationships, or if she is a student, this may indicate her lack of success in studies or her lack of excellence and the incompleteness of her relationship if she is engaged, by God. I know. If an unmarried girl sees convulsions on her face in a dream, this dream indicates that someone is stalking her. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing convulsions in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees convulsions on her face in her dream, this is a sign of the presence of people in her life They disturb her and cause her problems. Seeing a married woman suffering from convulsions in her body indicates her divorce or separation, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If she sees that she is suffering from convulsions and the convulsions stop after that, this indicates the repair of her relationship with her husband, stability in her family life, and the absence of anxiety and sadness. See also : Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing cramps in a dream for a man from the inside. Interpretation of seeing cramps in a dream in detail. It is the man who sees cramps in his sleep, and it has many interpretations, including: If a man sees in a dream that he is suffering from cramps throughout his body, this indicates that he is suffering from worries. Problems, burdens, and tension

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating figs from Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about eating figs from a tree, and the interpretation of a dream about eating prickly pear.

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the dream of eating figs by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of the dream of eating figs in a dream depends on the date of seeing them, because fruit fruits in general, if the dreamer sees them in their season, are promising, but if he sees them at an inappropriate date, then it is evil and sad for them to come to him. His life, and there is a lot of evidence for a dream about figs related to its color and taste, which you will learn in the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs. When the dreamer holds fresh figs in his hand and eats them in a dream, this is an indication of many positive developments and changes in His life that will make him achieve the prosperity and elevation that he sought. When a student finds a bowl full of figs, and the dream was about the time of planting the figs, the vision indicates his superiority and his arrival at an important stage of education and prosperity. The fruit merchant who sees a lot of figs in his dream enters a new and different turn in his life. Which increases his wealth and commercial activity. The dreamer who enjoys an abundance of wealth and goodness in his life and witnesses figs in his home, knowing that the time of the dream is different from the time of planting figs, his life is ruined. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs by Ibn Sirin. The appearance of many figs in a dream is a sign of food and blessing in the home. If the fortuneteller eats figs and gives them to all his family members, he will receive many good things and God will make them slaves of his family to provide them with money and meet their needs. The bad smell emanating from the figs is not good in the dream and indicates painful news or money of questionable origin. When the dreamer takes figs from A person in the vision, then this is an expensive gift that he receives from the same person. As for taking figs from a dead person, it is interpreted as the inheritance that the dreamer takes from them, and if he gets a lot of figs, it is a great inheritance that he will enjoy in his last days. If the dreamer gets a few figs, He will receive an inheritance or just money from this dead person. When a married man sees that he bought a lot of fresh figs, brought them home and gave them to his wife and children and saw them eating and having fun, he will become rich in the near future and compensate his family. About the drought and poverty that afflicted them before, in addition to the fact that the dream shows a distinctive characteristic, which is the generosity and generosity that characterizes the dreamer in his life in general, whether with his family or with strangers. Interpretation of a dream about eating figs for a single womanWhen the dreamer enjoys the sweet taste of figs in a dream, knowing that his goal The biggest in reality is marriage, so the vision in this case indicates the following: Whether or not: Her life partner will be wealthy and this will increase her sense of comfort and happiness because she will live a luxurious life that many girls desire. Second: Her husband will not be chosen on a logical basis, but rather they will live A beautiful love story makes her happy. But if the dreamer focuses all her attention and focuses on her professional developments and professional successes, then her vision of figs indicates her great status and the wonderful position she enjoys at work in particular and in society in general. When she gets sick and searches for a medicine that will save her from the pain of the disease and dreams of

title: Seeing an unknown old woman in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The old man is said to represent the absence of peace and security and the loss of hope for the future. To learn more about this dream from our interpreter, follow the lines below. Interpretation of seeing an unknown old woman in a dream about a single girl Seeing an unknown old woman in a dream for a single woman means weakness, weakness and surrender in life. Whoever sees an old woman chasing her in a dream suffers from instability and comfort in her life. The evil old woman in a dream expresses that the dreamer deceives others and may be exposed to deception and lies. Whoever shakes hands with the old woman in a dream, these are many sins upon sin, and God knows best. When a single woman dreams of an old man proposing to her. She may marry a man older than her and suffering from chronic diseases. The death of the old woman in a dream is good news of salvation and guidance for the vision. The ugly old woman in a dream symbolizes disobedience to parents. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is being severely beaten by an old woman. She suffers from the mistreatment of her brothers and the cruelty of her parents. See also: Interpretation and meaning of seeing an unknown and strange woman in a dream Interpretation of seeing an unknown old woman in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married old woman in a dream shows her sadness and misery in His married life. And whoever shakes hands with an old woman in a dream fears losing her husband and asks for his approval. Escaping from a scary old woman in a dream. A sign that the dreamer is very nervous and this makes her uninterested in her surroundings. And whoever hits an old woman in a dream mistreats her children and husband. And the death of an old woman in a dream expresses sadness and regret for what has passed, and it was also said a financial loss, and God knows best. The ugly old woman in a dream symbolizes the dreamer's bad reputation and shameful behavior. Which harms the reputation of her children and husband, and God knows best. Seeing an old woman turning into a young woman in a dream indicates pregnancy in old age. Killing an old man in a dream and killing for confusion and repentance from sin. Interpretation of seeing an unknown old woman in a dream about a man and its meaning Imam Ibn Sirin says that the old woman in a man's dream is a symbol of the world and its demise. The dream of an old man is abundant in a dream, evidence that the dreamer can be deceived, and God knows best. When a man sees in his dream an old woman suffering from severe illness. This is evidence of the weakness of the seer and his humiliation in this world and his lack of resourcefulness. And whoever sees an old woman in a dream Hungry or thirsty, he suffers from lack of money and distress. As for the veiled old woman, she expresses sorrow and regret, and God knows best. Living with an old woman in a dream is evidence that the dreamer cannot complete his matter. He cannot lift harm and injustice from himself and his family. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing an old man among people in a dream has two interpretations, the first of which is that the dreamer lives a safe, calm and peaceful life. The second interpretation expresses the abundance of challenges and gossip in the fortune teller's life. This is due to the problems of his wife and family, and perhaps the nature of his wife, and the difficulty of her marriage. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin The meaning of seeing an unknown old woman in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation When a pregnant woman sees an old woman in her dream. Her delivery may be delayed and her work may be delayed

title: Interpretation of seeing a train in a dream in detail

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a train in a dream is detailed by Ibn Sirin or Imam Al-Sadiq and varies according to whether the vision of the train is moving, stationary, or traveling by train, as train indicators generally indicate success, distinction, striving, and reaching, and vary according to the condition of the person who had the vision, and we will learn about the full symbols through the paragraphs. Interpretation Seeing a train in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a train in a dream indicates success, excellence, effort, and ambition to achieve goals and satisfy desires. Seeing a train in a dream indicates planning and thinking about the future. Seeing a train in a dream indicates the longevity of the dreamer. Seeing a train running quickly in a dream shows that Larry is making correct decisions. And healthy in his life. Seeing riding a train in a dream indicates the right path in life. Seeing a train in a dream and sitting in a special place on it indicates a high position that the dreamer has received. Seeing the dreamer driving the train and meeting a strange woman in it shows a lot of work and effort in his life. Seeing yourself driving A train in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer will take on a new job or position in a dream. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a train track in a dream. Interpretation of a single woman seeing a train in a dream. Seeing a train in one dream. It indicates the pursuit of great goals and desires. Seeing a single train in a dream. Remember her approach to Marriage. Single people seeing a carriage on the train shows that there is something that worries her a lot and is causing her stress and anxiety. Interpretation of seeing a train in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a train in a dream for a married woman that is moving slowly and it seems that it is coming. Seeing a train running slowly in a dream for a married woman shows that she is suffering from many problems in her life. Seeing a married woman on a train in a dream indicates that she will become pregnant again in the near future. Seeing a married woman waiting for a train in a dream indicates good changes in her life. Seeing a married woman getting off the train in a dream indicates her separation from her husband as a result of many disagreements in their lives. A married woman sees A fast train in a dream: Indicating a change in financial circumstances for the better for her and her husband. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a train running in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a train in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman on a train in a dream indicates her upcoming date of birth. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is stuck on the train with difficulty. Indicating Until her birth will be painful or difficult. Seeing a train in a dream running moderately indicates the ease of giving birth for herself and the health of her fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream of a train moving slowly indicates that she suffered a health crisis during pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a train in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream about A train instead of God Almighty for her other husband. Interpretation of a man who sees a train in a dream. Seeing a man in a dream of a train shows that his condition will change for the better in the near future. A man seeing an empty freight train in a dream shows that he is losing his money. Seeing a man driving a train and moving slowly indicates his death. See other interpretations: Interpretation Seeing someone sleeping on my lap in a dream - interpretation of...

title: Interpretation of seeing the dead giving gold to the living in a dream

preview.html: The gold that a dead person gave to a living man indicates a lot of goodness, but if it is a large piece of gold. This is evidence of what the dreamer will receive in terms of abundant sustenance and a lot that will soften his heart. He can obtain a higher position or, through his work, obtain A promotion or a prestigious position. Seeing gold from the dead may indicate a lot of sustenance from God for the pioneer, and it may indicate happiness and joy for the dreamer. Gold given by the dead indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrow and a change in circumstances for the better, and God knows best, as the dreamer’s financial condition improves. Seeing Gold from the dead in a dream indicates marriage, as well as sustenance and kindness, and is blessed with good offspring that please the eye. He can gain valuable knowledge and ideas. Interpretation of giving a dead man a gold ring in a dream The great translator Ibn Sirin says that receiving gold from a dead person indicates a lot of sustenance and kindness. The vision also foretells sustenance, whether in health or money. It also says joy and happiness, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds goodness and happiness. A vision of getting gold from among the dead indicates great power that you enjoy, a promotion at work, or a prominent official position or Prime Minister. The size of gold also increased according to position and power. Interpretation of a dream about giving a gold earring to an unmarried woman indicates seeing a gold earring from a dead person to improve material and living, the girl comes new joy and happiness. The earring can indicate selfishness, taking care of oneself, and being alone, without others, is the fulfillment of the dream And the highest goal that you are striving for. This vision is one of the beautiful and favorite visions among interpreters, and it is good news. It is also a sign from the dead that indicates his place in Paradise, then the satisfaction of God Almighty, and God knows best. Seeing someone giving a gold earring in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a lot. Of food, a lot of work, married life, and enjoying stability. The dream indicates a relationship and marriage with a good person whom God cares about for you. The vision can lead to getting rid of problems, solving them, and ending the conflict with the opponent. Interpretation of gifting a gold earring to a woman married to a dead woman. Seeing gold in a dream about a dead person, This indicates a responsibility weighing on her shoulders and many things occupying her mind and she may need advice on how to deal with the crisis as well as how to solve it. Seeing a golden earring from a dead woman suggests intelligence, some flexibility, results and changes that are happening around her in her social and professional life, and she looks forward to the future that she wants. Achieved. Seeing a husband giving his partner a neck indicates the intimate relationship between them, love, stability, and enjoyment of calm and renewal in shared life. Interpretation of giving gold to a pregnant woman in a dream: The vision here, when he gives gold to a pregnant woman, indicates the approaching date of birth, as she will have a daughter and she will be beautiful. It indicates The dream indicates that fatigue, problems, and worries will go away, life will return to calm as it was, and stability will stabilize between the two partners. The dream in a dream can indicate optimism, happiness, goodness, and happiness.

Achieved. Seeing a husband giving his partner a neck indicates the intimate relationship between them, love, stability, and enjoyment of calm and renewal in shared life. It indicates The dream indicates that fatigue, problems, and worries will go away, life will return to calm as it was, and stability will stabilize between the two partners. The dream in a dream can indicate optimism, happiness, goodness, and happiness.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing fear of geckos in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Fear of a gecko in a dream: A gecko or gecko is one of the small reptiles that lives in warm regions of the world and is common on all continents. There is disagreement between situations and details that differ from one person to another and affect the context of the dream. Fear of a gecko in a dream. Seeing the stomach expresses the enemy. She is weak and resourceful, but she struggles to transmit information and share people's secrets. She is cunning in her hostility. She is a gossiper and spreads rumors to people to sow doubts. Hearts of certainty and faith. And whoever fears being silenced, let him look at his religion and faith, if it is weak, and if he sees that it is coming out of the stomach out of fear, then this indicates weakness, lack of resourcefulness, weak faith, and weakness. The work of corrupt people and the machinations of sinners are rejected. And whoever sees his stomach killing him, this indicates that the enemies have taken control of him, drawn him toward desires and pleasures, and led him astray from the truth. But if the stomach fights him and kills him, this means victory over the enemies, attaining authority, chasing temptations, and extinguishing their fires. Pursuing the people of falsehood and hostility, defeating them, saving oneself from danger, deception, and temptation, and providing safety to mankind. The soul is one of the vicissitudes of this world. Fear of the gecko in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin believes that slander is a people who forbid good and command evil and spread corruption and misguidance on earth. Whoever is characterized by his characteristics by sins, gossip, conspiracies and enmity and there is no good in their company. And whoever sees that he is afraid of being bitten, then this It indicates his fear of falling into temptation and working to avoid suspicion, openness and hiding, and staying away from the depths of conflict and conflict, and this fear is a reflection of weak faith and disbelief. Whoever testifies that he leaves the flock and is afraid to confront it, this is a sign of fickle faith and lack of steadfastness in the truth, and whoever enjoins the truth and forbids it. From evil except with his heart. Fear of the flock is also evidence of life's hardships, trials, and vile fluctuations. And if he sees his stomach chasing him, this shows a cunning man trying to mislead him from the truth, and lurking with him and conspiring for him, and he is afflicted with hostility and hatred, and shows him love and friendship, and he does not want any good or benefit. Fear of a gecko in a single woman’s dream: Seeing the stomach symbolizes an enemy who is good at color and hypocrisy. He hides her enmity and shows her affection. He is gossipy and does not seek good. He tries to harm her and ruin her life, and he can spread lies. In her heart to mislead her from the truth and keep her away from natural instinct. If an unmarried woman sees that she is afraid of a burden, this indicates her fear of falling into temptation and anxiety that the winds of hypocrisy and corruption will touch her. And if she sees her belly chasing her and she is afraid, then this is a corrupt group of women chasing her despite her attempts to escape from it. In vain, but if you killed the stake or took his hand, you succeeded. To defeat enemies and defeat them. Escaping from geckos in a single woman’s dream. Whoever sees that he is escaping from a gecko, this indicates that there is a woman who overtakes him and seduces him with his religion and world and slanders him with lies, and the fortuneteller tries to stay away from her to no avail. This vision also expresses pleasures and temptation.

title: Interpretation of a dead person washing his clothes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a dead person washing clothes in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man washing clothes, a dead person washing his clothes, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of a dead person washing clothes in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a dead person washing his clothes. This is better for the dead person than the washed person. Whoever dreams that he washes his clothes from dirt, this indicates his righteousness and salvation from Sadness and sorrow, makes his life happy, and repays his debt if he wears it. But if he does not wear it, then it is under it. As for the dream of washing clean clothes, if dirt appears from them, then it is corruption in religion and the commission of sins. As for the dream of washing clothes with cold water, it is interpreted in four ways: repentance, well-being, salvation from distress, and safety from fear. It was said: Whoever dreams of washing pure clothes, it means an increase in his piety and piety, and it is said: This is an exaggeration because he does not deserve to wash. Interpretation of washing the clothes of a dead person in a dream: If you see that someone is washing the clothes of a dead person, then the washing has been done well, and his reward has reached the dead person, so it is He does good on his behalf, pays off a debt on his behalf, and reconciles with him. The adversary is with him, he forgives those with whom he has enmity, or disburses charity or supplication to him, or fulfills his will. Interpretation of a dream about washing a dead person in a dream A dream about washing a dead person - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a father crying in a dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, the most important things I mentioned: the interpretation of a dream about a father crying in a dream about good and evil. This was done through our article in the encyclopedia, as the father’s cry strengthens the heart of righteous children, and this dream arouses in the soul various feelings of love, sadness, and fear for the father, and thinking about what he may be exposed to. Of something that saddens him. His heart is a praiseworthy vision or not that bodes well. This is what we will discuss together in this article, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a father crying in a dream. Dream interpreters have agreed on the interpretation of a dream about a father crying in a dream: It relieves his heart of all anguish and anguish, because it carries within it interpretations of goodness, happiness, and living. Interpret Dream interpretation scholars describe seeing a father’s water without making a sound in a dream as follows: It is one of the good visions that indicate the fulfillment of everything that the dreamer wants, and the achievement of the highest levels by the command of God, the Most High Lord, and All-Knowing. Seeing a dead father crying in a dream indicates a dreamer. The father’s invitation to the son to give charity or pray for him if he is in need of these sincere supplications and good deeds, even though he was not near the son, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, seeing the deceased father crying constantly in the dreamer’s dream means that he is. He is asked to pray and remind him of all goodness and to give him charity, as the Lord is the Most High, the All-Knowing. Seeing one’s father’s water while traveling in a dream means; This does not bode well, as it is a sign of anxiety and distress, because the father is in dire need of a helping hand at that moment, and the Lord is the One who knows the unseen. The vision of the father’s water appears in the son or daughter’s dream, and the relationship between them was unstable. God warns this son and warns him of the torment that he will find if he does not do justice by disobedience and disobedience, so you must turn to God Almighty and pray for joy for him, and God alone knows. Seeing a father in a dream crying without a sound. For the sake of goodness, happiness, and the good relationship between the son and his father, and the Lord knows the unseen. Seeing a father crying in a dreamer’s dream and repeating this dream indicates that. A good life and the news that he will hear soon will make his heart happy, and only God is supreme and knows best. Seeing a father crying in a dream is misleading as a warning from father to son and his strong desire for family members to remember him and pray for him. In reality, he needs alms and prayers, and God alone is supreme. And he knows better. The interpretation of seeing a father crying in a dream and talking to his daughter, advising and guiding her. Almighty God is testing the girl in a trial in which she falls, and perhaps His mercy will triumph over her soon. Seeing a father crying in a dream and talking to his son means: the father’s suffering or great sadness and his desire to support and receive support from others, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. To see a living father crying in a dreamer’s dream It means: He is suffering from psychological or financial distress, as he desires to search for the path to happiness, but he does not find sufficient support, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a father in a dream crying is interpreted as suffering from financial distress and the son must help his father in reality to overcome this ordeal. But this dream symbolizes the approaching date of the father with the great relief by order. God is Most High and Most Knowing. It symbolizes the...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing birds in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about birds in a dream in detail, and interpretation of seeing birds in a dream for single women, married women, and pregnant women, seeing colorful birds and seeing birds attacking, according to leading interpreters and scholars. Everyone sees birds in their lives, and this is normal and common, but the question is what does seeing birds in a dream mean, because it certainly indicates many things. Of the various meanings and indicators that are discovered through the interpretation of seeing birds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing birds: The interpretation of seeing birds in a dream is generally a source of nourishment, joy, and kindness and symbolizes greater freedom, ambition, and the desire to achieve hopes and aspirations. It is also a sign of love, happiness, and joy, and the attainment of a great and distinguished position, and an indication of leadership and high status. Interpretation of a dream about birds by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained that seeing birds in a dream indicates the hopes that the dreamer desires to achieve. Seeing birds in a dream symbolizes joy, pleasure, and love. Seeing The death of birds in a dream is a sign of failure to achieve ambitions and feelings of disappointment. Seeing a bird attacking someone is evidence that he is not sure of his faith. As for the bird’s nest in the dream, it indicates a new opportunity or a lot of money. Interpretation of dreams of birds in the hand in a dream, because It shows goodness and benefit. The interpretation of seeing a bird’s beak in a dream is evidence of money. The interpretation of seeing bird feathers in a dream indicates abundant and abundant blessings. Interpretation of a dream about birds by Al-Nabulsi: Seeing birds in a dream is evidence of greatness and power. Interpretation of a dream about a bird in a merchant’s dream indicates that He obtained a large profit. Interpretation of seeing birds falling on the dreamer’s head is an indication of travel to him soon. Interpretation of a dream about water birds in a dream is evidence of assuming the presidency of the republic and the government. Dreaming of an unknown bird in a dream is a sign of warning and advice. Interpretation of a dream about birds by Ibn Shaheen: Narrated by Ibn Shaheen Shaheen said that whoever sees him talking to birds in a dream, it indicates prestige and prestige. The interpretation of seeing a bird carrying a backpack in a dream indicates anxiety and fear. Seeing birds gathering in a dream on one’s head indicates that one has taken responsibility. Seeing birds gathering Leaves or worms from the house and are already flying in the sky, as a sign of the death of the patient in that house. Interpretation of a dream about birds for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about birds in a dream for a single girl is evidence of love and romance in her life. Interpretation of a dream about birds for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing a married woman In a dream, it is an indication that her worries and anxieties have disappeared. Interpretation of a dream about birds for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees birds in a dream is a sign of her good news. Interpretation of seeing a male bird in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she will give birth to a child. As for seeing a bird in a dream, it indicates that She has a son.
